```{python echo=FALSE, results="asis"}

import pandas as pd

# Create a DataFrame
data = {
    'Name': ['Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie'],
    'Age': [25, 30, 35],
    'City': ['New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago']
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Convert DataFrame to HTML
html_table = df.to_html(index=False)

# Save or display the HTML
print(html_table)
```



```{python echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
from tabulate import tabulate

# Data to display
data = [
    ["Alice", 25, "New York"],
    ["Bob", 30, "Los Angeles"],
    ["Charlie", 35, "Chicago"]
]

# Generate HTML table without headers
html_table = tabulate(data, tablefmt="html")

print(html_table)
```



```{r echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
library(htmlTable)
library(magrittr)
# A simple output
matrix(1:4,
       ncol = 2,
       dimnames = list(c("Row 1", "Row 2"),
                       c("Column 1", "Column 2"))) %>% 
  htmlTable
```
